attributes.action: Write the Constitution and Our rights as UK Citizens.
attributes.background: We all need to know our rights. We only get told them when arrested or if you search through the internet. A written constitution and rights should be published to the public.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

You'll need to give your full name to start a petition.
